Get Thread ID From WEB ID
api_list.description:
You can get thread id using web id with this endpoint.

Thread id and web id is not same.
Web ID: https://www.threads.net/t/CuXCjGVrd6R -> **CuXCjGVrd6R**
And Thread ID: 3141033629837245414

api_list.name: Get User Following
api_list.description: Returns user following. **Meta Threads currently has a limited number of answers for this endpoint. When Meta Threads APP supports pagination it will be added here.**
